app.title: Advanced items for SMS
app.p: Advanced items for SMS include items for evaluating an advanced EnMS in an organization. The advanced items are described in

non-normative-note.p: Score of items related status improving the organizations’ energy performance directly is two points.

app.p: The organization should evaluate their EnMS according to the advanced items for SMS. To conduct the evaluation the organization should assess if the organization’s EnMS has attained each evaluation criteria. When the EnMS attains the evaluation criteria, the organization gets a score for that item. After evaluation of the entity against the criteria in the score for advanced SMS items is calculated.
